posts.title: Gearbound: Odyssey Level overhaul
posts.body: Hello, Today I bring some good new, I'm currently re-doing every level in the game and I now have a level editor so the TEAM can help make levels.

posts.title: Gearbound: Odyssey vertical slice
posts.body: Three planets playable with traversal gadgets and secret routes. Trailer cut in progress.

posts.title: Turn&Burn free-roam netcode alpha
posts.body: FishNet open-world tests are stable. Overtake logic & skidmarks syncing under heavy load look solid.

posts.title: Labyrinth playtest build hits internal milestone
posts.body: New boss AI, tighter melee timing, and synced leaderboard for raids are in. Public playtest sign-ups soon.

posts.title: Project Update: Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom
posts.body: After much thought, we’ve made the decision to end development on Labyrinth: Shadows of the Kingdom. This was never an easy choice…
